    • Method Detail

      • checkIntersection

        public boolean checkIntersection(double x,
                                 double y,
                                 double width,
                                 double height)
        Checks the intersections based on an x, y position based off of the center of the rectangle hitbox
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate
        y - The y-coordinate
        width - The width of the obstacle
        height - The height of the obstacle
        Returns:
        returns true if the 2 hitboxes run into each other, false otherwise.

      • checkIntersection

        Checks the intersection between two circles
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coord
        y - The y-coord
        r - The radius
        Returns:
        True if intersection
